author: thelabdude
msg: SOLR-6843: JMX RMI connector should be disabled by default but can be activated by setting ENABLE_REMOTE_JMX_OPTS to true in solr.in.(sh|cmd).

author: salyh
msg: GERONIMO-6536 MimeBodyPart.setText(String, String, String) ignores subType

author: markt
msg: Ensure that the result of calling HttpServletRequest.getContextPath() is neither decoded nor normalized as required by the Servlet specification.
